title: Shady Or Not: Why Is Her Number Disguised In His Phone?
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
She's starting to fall for the guy she's dating. And even though they are not exclusive yet, it feels like they're in a relationship.
Here's the problem: After she accidentally sent him a text, she noticed her name popped up under the name of a man!
Is there a logical reason why her name would be disguised in his phone?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
